channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tom Brady on Philip Rivers Comeback: 'I Certainly Could' Still Play QB in the NFL
item.description: Even at 48 and three years removed from the NFL, Tom Brady is confident that he can have success if he played today.

item.title: Tom Brady on his growth in the broadcast booth: 'Our best is yet to come' ðŸ™Œ | The Herd
item.description: Tom Brady joins Colin Cowherd to break down his broadcasting approach and growth as a broadcaster.

item.title: The Big Picture: MVP-Worthy Season Has Matthew Stafford on Hall of Fame Trajectory
item.description: At age 37, Matthew Stafford could win his first MVP award and maybe even another Super Bowl, which would cement his Hall of Fame case.

item.title: Tom Brady on Phillip Rivers' return: 'Who retires and un-retires and out of retirement?' ðŸ˜… | The Herd
item.description: Tom Brady discusses Phillip Rivers' return to the NFL and if he could hypothetically do so (if he was allowed to).

item.title: Tom Brady says Chiefs have 'the foundation for success' despite season-long struggles | The Herd
item.description: Tom Brady explains why the Kansas City Chiefs have the foundation for success despite their season-long struggles.

item.title: Brady Cook to start? Jets could do something at QB they haven't done in 50 years
item.description: If Tyrod Taylor and Justin Fields can't go, New York will start its first undrafted rookie since 1975.

item.title: Philip Rivers could join exclusive list of athletes to suit up while being a grandparent
item.description: If the 44-year-old plays this season, he won't be the first grandparent to suit up.

item.title: Moore expected in court Fri., remains in custody
item.description: Fired Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore, who remains in custody as a suspect in an alleged assault, is expected to appear in court for arraignmen...

item.title: Former Padres closer Suarez signs with Braves
item.description: Former Padres closer Robert Suarez has signed a three-year, $45 million contract with the Atlanta Braves, the team announced Thursday..

item.title: Steelers' Watt at hospital having lung evaluated
item.description: Steelers star pass rusher T.J. Watt is in a local hospital for further lung evaluation after "experiencing discomfort" at the practice facility Wednes...
